name: Flame Noble Knight Roland
desc: (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card from your hand to that target as an Equip Spell that makes it gain 500 ATK. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there this turn: You can add 1 FIRE Warrior monster or 1 Equip Spell from your Deck to your hand, except "Flame Noble Knight Roland". You can only use each effect of "Flame Noble Knight Roland" once per turn.
